thread.title: BRIEF-Ametek Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.78

title: BRIEF-Ametek Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.78
text:
May 2, 2018 / 10:53 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Ametek Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.78 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Ametek Inc:
* AMETEK ANNOUNCES RECORD FIRST QUARTER RESULTS AND RAISES 2018 GUIDANCE * Q1 SALES $1.17 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.12 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.72 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 SALES UP ABOUT 10 PERCENT
* EXPECT OVERALL SALES IN 2018 TO INCREASE LOW-DOUBLE DIGITS ON A PERCENTAGE BASIS
* EXPECT OVERALL SALES IN 2018 TO INCREASE LOW-DOUBLE DIGITS ON A PERCENTAGE BASIS, WITH ORGANIC SALES UP MID-SINGLE DIGITS
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.05, REVENUE VIEW $4.66 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.77, REVENUE VIEW $1.17 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
